title: nigelisme
author: nigelisme
content: Are you looking for a reliable and anonymous Virtual Private Server (VPS) provider that allows you to pay with Bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies? Look no further than Casbay! With Casbay's VPS plans, you can enjoy robust hosting solutions that prioritize your privacy and security, all while using the convenience of cryptocurrencies for payment.Casbay offers a range of VPS hosting pricing plans to suit different requirements and budgets. Here is a list of their VPS hosting pricing plans:Basic VPS Plan:1 CPU core1 GB RAM20 GB SSD storage1 GB bandwidth1 dedicated IP addressAdvanced VPS Plan:2 CPU cores2 GB RAM40 GB SSD storage1 GB bandwidth1 dedicated IP addressPro VPS Plan:4 CPU cores4 GB RAM80 GB SSD storage1 GB bandwidth1 dedicated IP addressEnterprise VPS Plan:8 CPU cores8 GB RAM160 GB SSD storage1 GB bandwidth1 dedicated IP addressNote: Casbay offers additional options for customizing VPS plans (https://www.casbay.com/cloud-hosting/price) with higher CPU cores, RAM, storage, and bandwidth, as well as optional add-ons such as cPanel/WHM control panel, additional IP addresses, and more.For detailed and up-to-date pricing information, it's best to visit Casbay's official website https://www.casbay.com or contact their sales team for a quote tailored to your specific needs.
